title: 3 Nephi 14:1
text: And now it came to pass that when Jesus had spoken these words he turned again to the multitude, and did open his mouth unto them again, saying: Verily, verily, I say unto you, Judge not, that ye be not judged.

title: 3 Nephi 14:2
text: For with what judgment ye judge, ye shall be judged; and with what measure ye mete, it shall be measured to you again.

title: 3 Nephi 14:3
text: And why beholdest thou the mote that is in thy brother's eye, but considerest not the beam that is in thine own eye?

title: 3 Nephi 14:4
text: Or how wilt thou say to thy brother: Let me pull the mote out of thine eye--and behold, a beam is in thine own eye?

title: 3 Nephi 14:5
text: Thou hypocrite, first cast the beam out of thine own eye; and then shalt thou see clearly to cast the mote out of thy brother's eye.

title: 3 Nephi 14:6
text: Give not that which is holy unto the dogs, neither cast ye your pearls before swine, lest they trample them under their feet, and turn again and rend you.

title: 3 Nephi 14:7
text: Ask, and it shall be given unto you; seek, and ye shall find; knock, and it shall be opened unto you.

title: 3 Nephi 14:8
text: For every one that asketh, receiveth; and he that seeketh, findeth; and to him that knocketh, it shall be opened.

title: 3 Nephi 14:9
text: Or what man is there of you, who, if his son ask bread, will give him a stone?

title: 3 Nephi 14:10
text: Or if he ask a fish, will he give him a serpent?

title: 3 Nephi 14:11
text: If ye then, being evil, know how to give good gifts unto your children, how much more shall your Father who is in heaven give good things to them that ask him?

title: 3 Nephi 14:12
text: Therefore, all things whatsoever ye would that men should do to you, do ye even so to them, for this is the law and the prophets.

title: 3 Nephi 14:13
text: Enter ye in at the strait gate; for wide is the gate, and broad is the way, which leadeth to destruction, and many there be who go in thereat;

title: 3 Nephi 14:14
text: Because strait is the gate, and narrow is the way, which leadeth unto life, and few there be that find it.

title: 3 Nephi 14:15
text: Beware of false prophets, who come to you in sheep's clothing, but inwardly they are ravening wolves.

title: 3 Nephi 14:16
text: Ye shall know them by their fruits.  Do men gather grapes of thorns, or figs of thistles?

title: 3 Nephi 14:17
text: Even so every good tree bringeth forth good fruit; but a corrupt tree bringeth forth evil fruit.

title: 3 Nephi 14:18
text: A good tree cannot bring forth evil fruit, neither a corrupt tree bring forth good fruit.

title: 3 Nephi 14:19
text: Every tree that bringeth not forth good fruit is hewn down, and cast into the fire.

title: 3 Nephi 14:20
text: Wherefore, by their fruits ye shall know them.

title: 3 Nephi 14:21
text: Not every one that saith unto me, Lord, Lord, shall enter into the kingdom of heaven; but he that doeth the will of my Father who is in heaven.

title: 3 Nephi 14:22
text: Many will say to me in that day: Lord, Lord, have we not prophesied in thy name, and in thy name have cast out devils, and in thy name done many wonderful works?

title: 3 Nephi 14:23
text: And then will I profess unto them: I never knew you; depart from me, ye that work iniquity.

title: 3 Nephi 14:24
text: Therefore, whoso heareth these sayings of mine and doeth them, I will liken him unto a wise man, who built his house upon a rock--

title: 3 Nephi 14:25
text: And the rain descended, and the floods came, and the winds blew, and beat upon that house; and it fell not, for it was founded upon a rock.

title: 3 Nephi 14:26
text: And every one that heareth these sayings of mine and doeth them not shall be likened unto a foolish man, who built his house upon the sand--

title: 3 Nephi 14:27
text: And the rain descended, and the floods came, and the winds blew, and beat upon that house; and it fell, and great was the fall of it.
